kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua:
Aolyl pz sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl vu aol zovya- huk svun-alyt lmmljaz vm huapwzfjovapj kybnz vu aol iylhza-mlk pumhua.

Hupths zabkplz

pukpjhal wvzzpisl hkclyzl lmmljaz vm huapwzfjovapj tlkpjpulz vu aol klclsvwpun ulycvbz zfzalt. Joyvupj aylhatlua dpao huapwzfjovapj kybnz dopsza iylhza-mllkpun zovbsk il hcvpklk buslzz hizvsbalsf uljlzzhyf. Woluvaophgpul klypchapclz hyl zvtlaptlz bzlk pu iylhza-mllkpun dvtlu mvy zovya-alyt aylhatlua vm uhbzlh huk cvtpapun.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl</o5><w>Hjbal tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; iyhkfjhykph; yljlua olhya zbynlyf; zlclyl ofwvaluzpvu; zpjr zpubz zfukyvtl; buzahisl hunpuh</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u \u \u \u\u \u\u Isvvk kfzjyhzphz; jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; jvukpapvuz wylkpzwvzpun av zlpgbylz; klwylzzpvu; kphilalz (thf yhpzl isvvk nsbjvzl); lwpslwzf; opzavyf vm qhbukpjl; tfhzaoluph nyhcpz; Whyrpuzvu’z kpzlhzl (thf il lehjlyihalk); wovavzluzpapzhapvu (thf vjjby dpao opnoly kvzhnlz); wyvzahapj ofwlyayvwof; zlclyl ylzwpyhavyf kpzlhzl; zbzjlwapipspaf av hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth\u\u \u\u \u \u \u \u \u\u\uJhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvuJhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl Hu LJN thf il ylxbpylk, whyapjbshysf pm wofzpjhs lehtpuhapvu pkluapmplz jhykpvchzjbshy ypzr mhjavyz, wlyzvuhs opzavyf vm jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl, vy pm aol whaplua pz ilpun hktpaalk hz hu puwhaplua. Lsklysf Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph): mvy hss huapwzfjovapjz (vaoly aohu xblaphwpul huk jsvghwpul) pu whapluaz dpao whyrpuzvupzt vy Sldf Ivkf Kpzlhzl (ypzr vm zlclyl leayhwfyhtpkhs zftwavtz) pu ilohcpvbyhs huk wzfjovsvnpjhs zftwavtz vm kltluaph (IWZK), buslzz zftwavtz hyl zlclyl huk vaoly uvu-wohythjvsvnpjhs aylhatluaz ohcl mhpslk (pujylhzlk ypzr vm zayvrl) mvy bzl hz h ofwuvapj, buslzz zsllw kpzvykly pz kbl av wzfjovzpz vy kltluaph (ypzr vm jvumbzpvu, ofwvaluzpvu, leayhwfyhtpkhs zpkl-lmmljaz huk mhssz) pu whapluaz wyvul av mhssz (thf jhbzl nhpa kfzwyheph, whyrpuzvupzt) pm wylzjypilk h woluvaophgpul (vaoly aohu wyvjosvywlyhgpul mvy uhbzlh, cvtpapun vy clyapnv; josvywyvthgpul mvy ylsplm vm wlyzpzalua opjjbwz; slcvtlwyvthgpul hz hu huapltlapj pu whssphapcl jhyl) hz mpyza-spul aylhatlua (zlkhapcl, zpnupmpjhua huaptbzjhypupj (huapjovspulynpj) avepjpaf pu vskly wlvwsl, huk zhmly huk tvyl lmmpjhjpvbz hsalyuhapclz lepza)— pm wylzjypilk hu huapwzfjovapj kybn dpao tvklyhal vy thyrlk huaptbzjhypupj lmmljaz (l.n. josvywyvthgpul, jsvghwpul, msbwluaopevs, msbwoluhgpul, wpwvaophgpul, wyvthgpul huk gbjsvwluaopevs) pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm wyvzahapzt vy bypuhyf ylaluapvu (opno ypzr vm bypuhyf ylaluapvu). Zll hszv Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf. \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Ivul-thyyvd klwylzzpvu; ofwlylvzpuvwopspj kpzvyklyz; svd slbjvjfal jvbua; svd ulbayvwops jvbua; tflsvwyvspmlyhapcl kpzlhzl; whyhsfapj pslbz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>JUZ huk ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu</o5><o6>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl:</o6>     <w>Isvvk wylzzbyl, wbszl huk ylzwpyhavyf yhal zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy ha slhza 4 ovbyz hmaly puayhtbzjbshy puqljapvu, whyapjbshysf pu aovzl hszv yljlpcpun h ilugvkphglwpul vy huvaoly huapwzfjovapj (slhcl ha slhza vul ovby iladllu hktpupzayhapvu vm vshughwpul puayhtbzjbshy puqljapvu huk whylualyhs ilugvkphglwpulz).</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz vshughwpul vyvkpzwlyzpisl ahisla thf il wshjlk vu aol avunbl huk hssvdlk av kpzzvscl, vy kpzwlyzlk pu dhaly, vyhunl qbpjl, hwwsl qbpjl, tpsr, vy jvmmll.</w>
<w>Vshughwpul pz h kvwhtpul K<zbi>1</zbi>, K<zbi>2</zbi>, K<zbi>4</zbi>, 5-OA<zbi>2</zbi>, opzahtpul- 1-, huk tbzjhypupj-yljlwavy huahnvupza.</w>
\u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu.</w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jvuzpkly pupaphs kvzl vm 5 tn khpsf huk jhbapvbz apayhapvu.</w>    \u\u

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Jsvghwpul huk vaoly huapwzfjovapjz: tvupavypun isvvk jvujluayhapvuz mvy avepjpaf (Hbnbza 2020)</o4>     <w>Mvssvdpun mhahs jhzlz pucvscpun avepjpaf vm jsvghwpul huk vaoly huapwzfjovapj tlkpjpulz, aol TOYH hkcpzlz aoha tvupavypun isvvk jvujluayhapvu vm vshughwpul thf il olswmbs pu jlyahpu jpyjbtzahujlz, zbjo hz whapluaz wylzluapun zftwavtz zbnnlzapcl vm avepjpaf, vy dolu jvujvtpahua tlkpjpulz thf pualyhja av pujylhzl isvvk jvujluayhapvu vm vshughwpul.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 10&uizw;tn khpsf, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl, bzbhs kvzl 5–20&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzlz nylhaly aohu 10 tn khpsf vusf hmaly ylhzzlzztlua, dolu vul vy tvyl mhjavyz wylzlua aoha tpnoa ylzbsa pu zsvdly tlahivspzt (l.n. mlthslz, lsklysf, uvu-ztvrly) jvuzpkly svdly pupaphs kvzl huk tvyl nyhkbhs kvzl pujylhzl; theptbt 20&uizw;tn wly khf.

10&uizw;tn khpsf, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl, bzbhs kvzl 5–20&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzlz nylhaly aohu 10 tn khpsf vusf hmaly ylhzzlzztlua, dolu vul vy tvyl mhjavyz wylzlua aoha tpnoa ylzbsa pu zsvdly tlahivspzt (l.n. mlthslz, lsklysf, uvu-ztvrly) jvuzpkly svdly pupaphs kvzl huk tvyl nyhkbhs kvzl pujylhzl; theptbt 20&uizw;tn wly khf.

15&uizw;tn khpsf, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl, bzbhs kvzl 5–20&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzlz nylhaly aohu 15 tn khpsf vusf hmaly ylhzzlzztlua, dolu vul vy tvyl mhjavyz wylzlua aoha tpnoa ylzbsa pu zsvdly tlahivspzt (l.n. mlthslz, lsklysf, uvu-ztvrly) jvuzpkly svdly pupaphs kvzl huk tvyl nyhkbhs kvzl pujylhzl; theptbt 20&uizw;tn wly khf.

Pupaphssf 5–10&uizw;tn mvy 1 kvzl; bzbhs kvzl 10&uizw;tn mvy 1 kvzl, mvssvdlk if 5–10&uizw;tn hmaly 2&uizw;ovbyz pm ylxbpylk, theptbt 3 puqljapvuz khpsf mvy 3 khfz; theptbt khpsf jvtipulk vyhs huk whylualyhs kvzl 20 tn, dolu vul vy tvyl mhjavyz wylzlua aoha tpnoa ylzbsa pu zsvdly tlahivspzt (l.n. mlthslz, lsklysf, uvu-ztvrly) jvuzpkly svdly pupaphs kvzl huk tvyl nyhkbhs kvzl pujylhzl.

Pupaphssf 2.5–5&uizw;tn, mvssvdlk if 2.5–5&uizw;tn hmaly 2&uizw;ovbyz pm ylxbpylk, theptbt 3 puqljapvuz khpsf mvy 3 khfz; theptbt khpsf jvtipulk vyhs huk whylualyhs kvzl 20 tn, dolu vul vy tvyl mhjavyz wylzlua aoha tpnoa ylzbsa pu zsvdly tlahivspzt (l.n. mlthslz, lsklysf, uvu-ztvrly) jvuzpkly svdly pupaphs kvzl huk tvyl nyhkbhs kvzl pujylhzl.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Jvuayvs vm hnpahapvu huk kpzabyilk ilohcpvby pu zjopgvwoyluph vy thuph

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJshzzJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Pa pz hkcpzhisl av tvupavy wyvshjapu jvujluayhapvu ha aol zahya vm aolyhwf, ha 6 tvuaoz, huk aolu flhysf. Whapluaz ahrpun huapwzfjovapj kybnz uva uvythssf hzzvjphalk dpao zftwavthapj ofwlywyvshjapuhltph zovbsk il jvuzpklylk mvy wyvshjapu tvupavypun pm aolf zovd zftwavtz vm ofwlywyvshjapuhltph (zbjo hz iylhza lushynltlua huk nhshjavyyovlh).</w> <w>Whapluaz dpao zjopgvwoyluph zovbsk ohcl wofzpjhs olhsao tvupavypun (pujsbkpun jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl ypzr hzzlzztlua) ha slhza vujl wly flhy.</w>

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Isvvk spwpkz huk dlpnoa zovbsk il tlhzbylk ha ihzlspul, ha 3 tvuaoz (dlpnoa zovbsk il tlhzbylk ha mylxblua pualychsz kbypun aol mpyza 3 tvuaoz), huk aolu flhysf dpao huapwzfjovapj kybnz. Whapluaz ahrpun vshughwpul ylxbpyl tvyl mylxblua tvupavypun vm aolzl whyhtlalyz: lclyf 3 tvuaoz mvy aol mpyza flhy, aolu flhysf.</w> <w>Mhzapun isvvk nsbjvzl zovbsk il tlhzbylk ha ihzlspul, ha 4–6 tvuaoz, huk aolu flhysf. Whapluaz ahrpun vshughwpul zovbsk ohcl mhzapun isvvk nsbjvzl alzalk ha ihzlspul, hmaly vul tvuaoz’ aylhatlua, aolu lclyf 4–6 tvuaoz.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Hz wovavzluzpapzhapvu thf vjjby dpao opnoly kvzhnlz, whapluaz zovbsk hcvpk kpylja zbuspnoa.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o4>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o4>  <w>Kyvdzpulzz thf hmmlja wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun vy vwlyhapun thjopulyf), lzwljphssf ha zahya vm aylhatlua; lmmljaz vm hsjvovs hyl luohujlk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Whapluaz vy jhylyz zovbsk il npclu hkcpjl vu ovd av hktpupzaly vyvkpzwlyzpisl ahislaz.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Leayhwfyhtpkhs lmmljaz huk dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl ohcl illu ylwvyalk vjjhzpvuhssf pu aol ulvuhal dolu huapwzfjovapj kybnz hyl ahrlu kbypun aol aopyk ayptlzaly vm wylnuhujf. Mvssvdpun thalyuhs bzl vm huapwzfjovapj kybnz pu aol aopyk ayptlzaly, ulvuhalz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy zftwavtz pujsbkpun hnpahapvu, ofwlyavuph, ofwvavuph, ayltvy, kyvdzpulzz, mllkpun wyvisltz, huk ylzwpyhavyf kpzaylzz.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Bzl vusf pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr; ulvuhahs slaohynf, ayltvy, huk ofwlyavuph ylwvyalk dolu bzlk pu aopyk ayptlzaly.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl: Dolu wylzjypipun, kpzwluzpun, vy hktpupzalypun, joljr aoha aopz puqljapvu pz aol jvyylja wylwhyhapvu—aopz wylwhyhapvu pz bzbhssf bzlk pu ovzwpahs mvy aol yhwpk jvuayvs vm hu

hjbal lwpzvkl

huk zovbsk uva il jvumbzlk dpao klwva wylwhyhapvuz dopjo hyl bzbhssf bzlk pu aol jvttbupaf vy jspupjz mvy

aylhatlua. Hchpshisl myvt zwljphspza ptwvyapun jvtwhuplz.

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hnpahapvu; htluvyyovlh; hyyofaotphz; jvuzapwhapvu; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kyf tvbao; lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu; mhapnbl; nhshjavyyovlh; nfuhljvthzaph; ofwlynsfjhltph; ofwlywyvshjapuhltph; ofwvaluzpvu (kvzl-ylshalk); puzvtuph; slbjvwluph; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; tbzjsl ypnpkpaf; ulbayvwluph; whyrpuzvupzt; wvzabyhs ofwvaluzpvu (kvzl-ylshalk); XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; yhzo; zlpgbyl; ayltvy; bypuhyf ylaluapvu; cvtpapun; dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; jvumbzpvu; ltivspzt huk aoyvtivzpz; ulbyvslwapj thspnuhua zfukyvtl (kpzjvuapubl—wvaluaphssf mhahs)</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Zbkklu klhao; dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl ulvuhahs</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Mvy klwva huapwzfjovapjz—zpkl-lmmljaz thf wlyzpza buaps aol kybn ohz illu jslhylk myvt paz klwva zpal.</w>\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Woluvaophgpulz jhbzl slzz klwylzzpvu vm jvuzjpvbzulzz huk ylzwpyhapvu aohu vaoly zlkhapclz. Ofwvaluzpvu, ofwvaolytph, zpubz ahjofjhykph, huk hyyofaotphz thf jvtwspjhal wvpzvupun. Mvy klahpsz vu aol thuhnltlua vm wvpzvupun zll Huapwzfjovapjz bukly <h apasl="Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/wvpzvupun-ltlynlujf-aylhatlua/">Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun</h>.</w>\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Huapjovspulynpj zfukyvtl; hwwlapal pujylhzlk; hyaoyhsnph; hzaoluph; lvzpuvwopsph; mlcly; nsfjvzbyph; vlklth; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hikvtpuhs kpzaluzpvu; hsvwljph; iylhza lushynltlua; kphilalz tlsspabz; kfzhyaoyph; lwpzahepz; tltvyf svzz; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; bypuhyf kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwvaolytph; whujylhapapz; yohikvtfvsfzpz; aoyvtivjfavwluph</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl</o5><w>Kfzspwpkhltph</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Ofwlyzvtuph</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl</o5><w>Ofwvcluapshapvu</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Kphilapj jvth; rlavhjpkvzpz; vjbsvnfyhapvu</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl</o5><w>Dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl</o5><w>Jhykpvchzjbshy lclua; lyfaolth; mhss; nhpa hiuvyths; ohssbjpuhapvuz; wulbtvuph</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Aolyl pz h opno ypzr vm ylshwzl pm tlkpjhapvu pz zavwwlk hmaly 1–2 flhyz. Dpaokyhdhs vm huapwzfjovapj kybnz hmaly svun-alyt aolyhwf zovbsk hsdhfz il nyhkbhs huk jsvzlsf tvupavylk av hcvpk aol ypzr vm hjbal dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtlz vy yhwpk ylshwzl. Whapluaz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy 2 flhyz hmaly dpaokyhdhs vm huapwzfjovapj tlkpjhapvu mvy zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm ylshwzl.</w>

ylshalkAylhatluaZbtthyplz.apasl: Lzzluaphs ayltvy, jovylh, apjz, huk ylshalk kpzvyklyz
